casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Henry RAINES. No. 211A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2007. Jonathan E. Broun, Durham, for Raines. Joan Cunningham, Assistant Attorney General, Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of December 2007 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief to Stay Issuance of Mandate:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of December 2007."
